lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: "Pay It Forward" - a child‚Äôs philosophy that the world would be a better place if everyone tried to "pay it forward" by helping a stranger, and by that stranger in turn helping another. Based on a novel by Catherine Ryan Hyde, the movie "Pay It Forward" is about a boy named Trevor McKinney (Haley Joel Osment) who is inspired by his social studies teacher Mr. Simonet (Kevin Spacey) and comes up with a school project based on a simple concept: everyone should do something good for three people and ask them to "pay it forward" instead of pay it back. The basic concept of the movie‚Äôs title can be applied to my kiva.org account, affording me the opportunity to make a difference in the world by doing a good deed. Can individuals really make a difference in these troubled times? The power of a simple act of kindness can change the world in the most beautiful, gentle way. Just think back to when you were little and to the things you remember most of your childhood. Chances are you will have the clearest memories of the kindness someone extended to you. Those are the memories I hold in my heart as treasures in my life. Those simple acts of love and compassion have helped me through some subsequent terrible moments in my life. They have lifted my spirits in ways no material possession could. Do your part to make the world a better place. Get involved. Pay it forward.

WORLD AID TO NEEDYS ORGANIZATION(WANOs)
Our vision is to end extreme poverty worldwide by 2025. Our mission is to achieve the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) ‚Äì eight globally endorsed objectives to reduce extreme poverty ‚Äì in Africa by 2015. We believe that for the first time in history, our generation can end extreme poverty, hunger and preventable disease

NGO and Member OF Millennium Development Goals (MDGs)

lender.loan_because: .. im from Karachi Pakistan, i am 24 years old or i work in private company as a coordinator for 120$ per month. my father has expired n mother is illiterate. me my sis an a bro work t manage our house rent or other expense shortly I'd like to come to the point that i need financial help i searched allot to internet for help an for different NGOs or communities but thay only helps to those who became victims by sonami , hurricane or handicaps. whole world are working for them or helping them but there are alots of peoples here in the world who are not handicap, who are not victim by any sonami or hurricane but they are also human & surviving in their lives & they also need help i also tried to lend money to down payment to get home in installment at-least because i hard work for 120$ whole month & i give it to the land lord finaally i read an article about u n got ur email so i thought to try my destiny here i don't ask everything for free but this i need money as much as u can because what i believe is "If we have an ocean or we can help anyone by a drop so ocean doesn't change" don't think it is scam. if u would like to help reply me back so i can communicate further hoping to hear u soon your obediently Parii

lender.occupational_info: I work in my local community but, would like to be able to help more. Kiva lets me do true outreach.
